articles.description: As the duo resumed production on their highly-anticipated series, slated for a 2020 release, the 49-year-old Marvel wore a clear face shield and a black jean jacket.
articles.content:
Jeremy Renner and Hailee Steinfeld appeared to be putting safety first as they filmed scenes of the Hawkeye spin-off on rainy Thursday, amid the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.
